scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && yarn cache clean
scripts.clean-start: yarn run clean && yarn run rc-start
scripts.fresh-install: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.fresh-start: yarn run fresh-install && yarn run rc-start
